@praveen0553 - Just click the magnetic link. (The magnet icon that says get this Torrent and click ok on the popup after that. Will dowload to the specified folder. I am guessing you have utorrent already, if not google it.
NOTE when you click on the link and the popup comes hen you must clinck ok, the popup will be blank. Just press ok, the file is defititly there and will download. After a minute check your "files" tab in Utorrent and you will see it is there. Hope this is what you wanted.

then click ~unpack~.bat and everything should run as normal.

4: click ~unpack~.bat
